attributes.action: Opt OUT instead of IN organ donation.
attributes.additional_details:
From birth we should all be put on the register with people making the choice to opt out if they feel so strongly against it.

Please sign :)
attributes.background: With an opt-in system, people have to actively sign up to a register to donate their organs after death or families are left the difficult choice. In opt-out systems, organ donation will occur automatically unless a specific request is made before death for organs not to be taken.
